list.name: Netflix

steps.code: .netflix { position: relative; width: 140px; height: 250px; } .leg { position: absolute; width: 50px; height: 50px; z-index: 1; } .leg1 { left: 0; background-color: #a51219; }
.netflix { position: relative; width: 140px; height: 250px; } .leg { position: absolute; width: 50px; height: 100%; z-index: 1; } .leg1 { left: 0; background-color: #a51219; }

.netflix { position: relative; width: 140px; height: 250px; } .leg { position: absolute; width: 50px; height: 100%; z-index: 1; } .leg1 { left: 0; background-color: #a51219; } .leg2 { right: 0; background-color: #a51219; } .leg3 { left: 45px; transform: skewX(19.7deg); background-color: #de181f; box-shadow: 0 0 18px #00000088; } .base { position: absolute; width: 120%; height: 25px; bottom: -20px; left: -10px; border-radius: 50%; background-color: black; z-index: 3; }
:root { --white: #fff; --red: #fe2d52; --blue: #28ffff; } .tiktok { margin: 100px auto; width: 37px; height: 37px; background: #fff; position: relative; }
:root { --white: #fff; --red: #fe2d52; --blue: #28ffff; } .tiktok { margin: 100px auto; width: 37px; height: 218px; background: #fff; position: relative; }

:root { --white: #fff; --red: #fe2d52; --blue: #28ffff; } .tiktok { margin: 100px auto; width: 37px; height: 218px; background: #fff; position: relative; } .tiktok::after { box-sizing: content-box;  content: ''; position: absolute; border: 37px solid var(--white); border-top-color: transparent; width: 50px; height: 50px; border-radius: 50%; top: 123px; left: -137px; }

:root { --white: #fff; --red: #fe2d52; --blue: #28ffff; } .tiktok { margin: 100px auto; width: 37px; height: 218px; background: #fff; position: relative; } .tiktok::after { box-sizing: content-box;  content: ''; position: absolute; border: 37px solid var(--white); border-top-color: transparent; width: 100px; height: 100px; border-radius: 50%; transform: rotate(45deg); top: 123px; left: -137px; } .tiktok::before { box-sizing: content-box; content: ''; position: absolute; width: 140px; height: 140px; border: 30px solid transparent; border-bottom-color: var(--white); border-radius: 100%; top: -100px; right: -172px; }

:root { --white: #fff; --red: #fe2d52; --blue: #28ffff; } .tiktok { margin: 100px auto; width: 37px; height: 218px; background: #fff; position: relative; } .tiktok::after { box-sizing: content-box;  content: ''; position: absolute; border: 37px solid var(--white); border-top-color: transparent; width: 100px; height: 100px; border-radius: 50%; transform: rotate(45deg); top: 123px; left: -137px; } .tiktok::before { box-sizing: content-box; content: ''; position: absolute; width: 140px; height: 140px; border: 30px solid transparent; border-bottom-color: var(--white); border-radius: 100%; transform: rotate(45deg); top: -100px; right: -172px; }

:root { --white: #fff; --red: #fe2d52; --blue: #28ffff; } .tiktok { margin: 100px auto; width: 37px; height: 218px; background: #fff; filter: drop-shadow(-10px -10px 0 var(--blue)); position: relative; } .tiktok::after { box-sizing: content-box;  content: ''; position: absolute; border: 37px solid var(--white); border-top-color: transparent; width: 100px; height: 100px; border-radius: 50%; transform: rotate(45deg); top: 123px; left: -137px; } .tiktok::before { box-sizing: content-box; content: ''; position: absolute; width: 140px; height: 140px; border: 30px solid transparent; border-bottom-color: var(--white); border-radius: 100%; transform: rotate(45deg); top: -100px; right: -172px; }

:root { --white: #fff; --red: #fe2d52; --blue: #28ffff; } .tiktok { margin: 100px auto; width: 37px; height: 218px; background: #fff; box-shadow: 11px 10px 0 0 var(--red); filter: drop-shadow(-10px -10px 0 var(--blue)); position: relative; } .tiktok::after { box-sizing: content-box;  content: ''; position: absolute; border: 37px solid var(--white); border-top-color: transparent; width: 100px; height: 100px; border-radius: 50%; transform: rotate(45deg); filter: drop-shadow(16px 0 0 var(--red)); top: 123px; left: -137px; } .tiktok::before { box-sizing: content-box; content: ''; position: absolute; width: 140px; height: 140px; border: 30px solid transparent; border-bottom-color: var(--white); border-radius: 100%; transform: rotate(45deg); filter: drop-shadow(14px 0 0 var(--red)); top: -100px; right: -172px; }

steps.description: Un cuadrado simple de color Crimson.
steps.code: :root { --size: 150px; --color: crimson; } .heart { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--color); }
:root { --size: 150px; --color: crimson; } .heart { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--color); transform: rotate(-135deg); }

:root { --size: 150px; --color: crimson; } .heart { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--color); transform: rotate(-135deg); } .heart::before, .heart::after { position: absolute; width: var(--size); height: var(--size); content: ''; background-color: white; } .heart::before { top: 0%; } .heart::after { left: 0%; }

steps.description: Colocamos estos cuadrados en su sitio.
steps.code: :root { --size: 150px; --color: crimson; } .heart { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--color); transform: rotate(-135deg); } .heart::before, .heart::after { position: absolute; width: var(--size); height: var(--size); content: ''; background-color: white; } .heart::before { top: 50%; } .heart::after { left: 50%; }

steps.description: Una capa de pintura... Mmm, se ve un poco cuadrado.
steps.code: :root { --size: 150px; --color: crimson; } .heart { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--color); transform: rotate(-135deg); } .heart::before, .heart::after { position: absolute; width: var(--size); height: var(--size); content: ''; background-color: var(--color); } .heart::before { top: 50%; } .heart::after { left: 50%; }

:root { --size: 150px; --color: crimson; } .heart { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--color); transform: rotate(-135deg); } .heart::before, .heart::after { position: absolute; width: var(--size); height: var(--size); content: ''; background-color: var(--color); border-radius: 50%; } .heart::before { top: 50%; } .heart::after { left: 50%; }

list.name: Google
list.description: The G of the most popular searcher.

steps.code: .google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; }
.google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; --size: 250px; --border: calc(var(--size) / 5); position: relative; }

.google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; --size: 250px; --border: calc(var(--size) / 5); position: relative; } .a { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--blue); }

.google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; --size: 250px; --border: calc(var(--size) / 5); position: relative; } .a { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); border-top: var(--border) solid var(--red); border-left: var(--border) solid var(--yellow); border-bottom: var(--border) solid var(--green); }

.google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; --size: 250px; --border: calc(var(--size) / 5); position: relative; } .a { position: relative; width: var(--size); height: var(--size); border-top: var(--border) solid var(--red); border-left: var(--border) solid var(--yellow); border-bottom: var(--border) solid var(--green); border-right: var(--border) solid transparent; border-radius: calc(4 * var(--border)); z-index: 2; } .b { position: absolute; right: 0; bottom: 0; width: calc(var(--size) / 2); height: calc(var(--size) / 2); border-top: var(--border) solid var(--blue); border-right: var(--border) solid var(--blue); border-bottom: var(--border) solid var(--blue); border-radius: 0 0 var(--size) 0; }

list.name: LG
list.description: Can you see a face in the LG logo?

steps.code: :root { --size: 100px; --border: 4px; } .LG { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; position: relative; width: var(--size); height: var(--size); border-radius: 50%; background-color: #ea4335; } .G { width: 82%; height: 82%; border: var(--border) solid #fff; border-top: var(--border) solid transparent; border-radius: 50%; transform: rotateZ(45deg); } .LG:before { position: absolute; right: 13%; top: 50%; content: ''; display: block; width: 25%; height: 25%; border-top: var(--border) solid #fff; } .face { position: absolute; top: 30%; left: calc(50% - var(--border)); width: 14%; height: 42%; border: var(--border) solid #fff; border-right: none; border-top: none; } .face::before { position: absolute; right: 20px; content: ''; display: block; background-color: #fff; width: calc(var(--border) * 3); height: calc(var(--border) * 3); border-radius: 50%; }
